Name: Kyra Kruz
Description:
Kyra was shot in the head. They were a counsellor at the Gay and Lesbian Latino AIDS Education Initiative.

tdor.info names them as Kyra Cordova.

TvT project: Inquirer, 12.09.2012; Montgomery News, 04.10.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found in a ditch near the industrial area of Migliarino Pisano at 10am on 5th September. It is possible that she died as a result of a vehicle impact.

> This morning around 10 am, a dead trans woman was found inside a ditch, near the industrial area of Migliarino Pisano, very frequented by sex workers during the night. The body was noticed by one of the workers of the many companies in the area. The Carabinieri investigate the episode as the causes of death are not yet clear .
> 
> According to the latest developments, she may have been overwhelmed and killed by a  car. The investigations are focusing on this hypothesis: the military would have found parts of a vehicle in place that could make one think of a violent impact.

Her death was not recorded on the official TDoR 2012 list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU).

http://www.pisatoday.it/cronaca/trans-trovato-morto-fosso-migliarino-pisano.html

Name: Victoria (Marcos Gustavo) da Silva Costa
Description:
The police considered Victoria’s murder a hate crime, since she was decapitated, and the penis and one ear were cut off. The body was found near a garbage dumpster.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans.

Name: Sandy
Location: São José dos Campos, São Paulo
Description:
Sandy was attacked at dawn in the Campo dos Alemães neighborhood by the occupants of two cars who stopped nearby. 

The police were called after neighbours hear her shouts, but she died in hospital.

The area where she died is known as one where homeless people shelter.

> A transvestite was beaten to death at dawn this Monday (17) in the Campo dos Alemães neighborhood, south of São José dos Campos . The crime scene is known to shelter homeless people, including inside private grounds, surrounded by walls.
>
> According to the Civil Police, the victim - known as Sandy - was killed by occupants of two cars that stopped near the place where the trans woman was and beat her. The police still do not know the number of aggressors.
>
> The victim was eventually rescued from the hospital but could not resist her injuries, especially those to her head. The police were called by a resident who heard the shouts of the victim. 
 
http://g1.globo.com/sp/vale-do-paraiba-regiao/noticia/2012/09/travesti-e-espancado-ate-morte-em-sao-jose-dos-campos.html

Name: Raiony Batalha
Description:
Raiony was found face down and with her arms tied in her own house on Rua 16 in in the Alvorada 2 neighborhood of western Manaus. She had been stabbed in the abdomen.

The suspect is a neighbour who had made death threats to her.

> According to the delegate of the 10th Integrated Police District (Dip), Iris Coelho, family members reported that a neighbor named Maria Aparecida had some disagreements with Raiony, and that she had already threatened her with death a few times. At his house, five empty beer cans and twisted objects were found.

Raiony was a civil servant.

TvT project: D24AM, online portal, 24.09.12

Name: Carlinha
Description:
Carlinha was beaten around her head with a stone in an abandoned nightclub in the Marechal Rondon neighborhood. According  an argument may have preceded her killing.

> Marcela da Silva Nascimento witnessed the crime and said that she slept with the victim and another woman, named Aldelia Maria da Silva on the balcony of the disused nightclub. Marcela says that Adelia's boyfriend arrived on the scene this morning and started an argument. "He came and beat his girlfriend and got a stone to hit her, but she diverted it and the stone hit Carlinha's head," she explained.
> 
> Adelia says that she was asleep and did not see the perpetrator. "When I saw the stone I ran away," she explained. According to local residents, a nightclub was operating there a few years ago but currently the site is used by drug users.

TvT project: G1, online portal, 28.09.12

http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/noticia/2012/09/travesti-e-morto-com-uma-pedrada-em-ariquemes-ro.html
